messages.subject: Former home schooler has free science resource for others
messages.msgSnippet: Forwarded from a news release we received: My name is Amos Alexander, and I was home schooled from K-12. Now I m in college studying Journalism, and I publish
messages.messageBody:
Forwarded from a news release we received:

My name is Amos Alexander, and I was home schooled
from K-12. Now I'm in college studying
Journalism, and I publish a new, free resource to
help my fellow home schoolers learn science on the
internet.
Students will love the cartoon kids and
wholesome plots while they learn science from
the most basic principles.
This is a learning tool I would have really
enjoyed during my home schooling. I think others
will enjoy it, also.
It is completely free. Please visit my site,
give me some feedback, and then tell others
about it.

http://pweb.netcom.com/~moto2/index.htm


hear from you soon, Amos
